text: Lonnie Lee Hammargren (December 25, 1937 â€“ June 13, 2023) was an American politician and a retired neurosurgeon. He was elected a member of the non- partisan Board of Regents for the Nevada System of Higher Education. He was the 31st Lieutenant Governor of the U.S. State of Nevada from 1995 to 1999 as a member of the Republican Party. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Lieutenant Governors of Nevada Category:Scientists from Nevada Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Scientists from Minnesota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Neurosurgeons
title: Lonnie Hammargren
